Name: Floody
About the game: Let's Have Fun in a HARDCORE Party Game! Be the last one standing on platforms. Build the stage with friends. (And block them!) There are more rules waiting for you to discover! Features: * A LOOPING WORLD. A CHANGING WORLD . Every platform will show up again. * IN THE SAME SCENE BUT SEE THE DIFFERENT MAP . The fires on your platforms block your enemies but let yourself go through. * The fires on your platforms duplicate your own bullets. * 3 Jumps = 1 Bullet. * Horizontally screen wrapped. * ITEMS! * 2 to 4 players in either local or online multiplayer
Meta Title: Floody: Mar 2, 2021, Laidback Dog and Full Overview
